openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.block(*args, **kwargs)¶

This file contains all of the tags that pertain to User/Login objects

openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.is_online(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.pp_generate_key(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.pp_last_visit(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶
openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.pp_user_login_form(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

form_id = forms.CharField(widget=forms.HiddenInput(), initial=”pp_user_login_form”) This block tag can create or process forms either to create or to modify issues. Usage is as follows:

{% pp_user_login_form request=request return_path=request.MATH.PATH_INFO return_query=request.META.QUERY_STRING %}
Do stuff with {{ pp_login.form }}.

{% endpp_user_login_form%}

openassembly.pirate_login.templatetags.logintags.pp_user_registration_form(context, nodelist, *args, **kwargs)[source]¶

form_id = forms.CharField(widget=forms.HiddenInput(), initial=”pp_user_registration_form”) This block tag can create or process forms either to create or to modify issues. Usage is as follows:

{% pp_user_login_form request=request return_path=request.MATH.PATH_INFO return_query=request.META.QUERY_STRING %}
Do stuff with {{ pp_login.form }}.

{% endpp_user_login_form%}
